name: Tea Toss
description:
Tea Toss A game for the Historically Accurate Game Jam #5!

Based on the Boston Tea Party of 1773.

You have 177.3 seconds to grab as many crates of tea as you can, run to the edge of the ship while avoiding guards, and toss the tea overboard. 

Tea randomly spawns around the ship. Stealing all 3 crates from the crate stack in the bottom right makes the tea spawn faster but be careful, it also spawns a new guard!

Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys - Movement

Space - Pickup, Drop, and Toss Tea

Team

TehKevMaster

Trevorocalypse
